alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 12:55AM EDT until August 24 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR WESTERN HURON...EASTERN SENECA...ERIE AND EASTERN SANDUSKY COUNTIES... At 1255 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clyde to 6 miles west of Willard, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, Plymouth, Green Springs, Bloomville, Castalia, Monroeville, Attica, North Fairfield, Republic, Flat Rock, Whites Landing and Vickery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
